com.raaxxo.mph.sessions.remote

Class AdministratorManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.raaxxo.mph.sessions.remote.UserSession
      • com.raaxxo.mph.sessions.remote.BasicUserManager
        • com.raaxxo.mph.sessions.remote.AdministratorManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AdministratorManagerRemote, ArtifactViewerFunctionalities, BasicUserManagerInterface, CourseViewerFunctionalities, DeliverableViewerFunctionalities, ProjectViewerFunctionalities, TeamViewerFunctionalities, UserEditingFunctionalities, UserLoginFunctionalities, UserRegisteringFunctionalities, UserSessionInterface, UserViewerFunctionalities

    public class AdministratorManager
extends BasicUserManager
implements AdministratorManagerRemote
    Stateful session bean implementation of the AdministratorManagerRemote remote interface. It is used ONLY for testing purposes.
    The client module of MPH never calls for such a remote interface. In the next version of MPH will be created a new user class, the "Administrator" class, and this object will contain all the method callable by an "Administrator".

        Description copied from interface: UserRegisteringFunctionalities
        Register a new user with the given arguments
        Specified by:
        registerNewUser in interface UserRegisteringFunctionalities
        Parameters:
        theUsername - the chosen username
        thePasswordHash - the hash of the chosen password
        theFirstName - the user first name
        theLastName - the user last name
        theBirthday - the user birthday
        theEmail - the user email
        theTelephoneNumber - the user telephone number
        Throws:
        UsernameAlreadyExistsException - if the username given as parameter already exists in the database
        InvalidArgumentException - if one of the arguments is not valid
